episodes.title: From Cult to Neuroscientist: How Dr. Leah Zitter Escaped & Rewired Her Brain
episodes.description:
🌍🎙️ Dr. Leah Zitter spent over 20 years in an extremist religious cult before breaking free, earning a PhD in behavioral neuroscience, and developing the "as-is method" to rewire the brain.
In this powerful episode of Whereabouts Tales, Dr. Zitter shares her extraordinary journey of escape and transformation. She explains how our minds are programmed from birth by our environments, and how we can break free from harmful conditioning to reclaim our authentic selves.
"Each and every one of us are literally programmed by the rules, the methodology, the lifestyle of the group that we're brought up in."

🎙️ Whereabouts Tales explores expat experiences, personal growth, and inspiring life stories from around the world.
